Aevi API SDK version v2.3.0

  • All Classes

Uses of Package
com.aevi.helpers.services

  • Packages that use com.aevi.helpers.services 
    Package Description
    com.aevi.configuration
    This package provides classes to read configuration information about the terminal.
    com.aevi.crashlog
    This package provides classes for sending crash log data to the Acquirer's Device Management System for distribution and analysis.
    com.aevi.helpers
    This package provides helper classes and an overview of the available permissions.
    com.aevi.helpers.services
    This package contains the base classes for the various Aevi services and holds general exceptions that can be thrown in case of faults.
    com.aevi.led
    This package contains a helper class to control the LED on the aevi device.
    com.aevi.magstripe
    This package provides access to the magnetic stripe reader for non payment cards.
    com.aevi.mail
    This package provides mail functionality
    com.aevi.payment
    This package provides classes for integrating payment functionality in third-party applications.
    com.aevi.preferences
    This package provides classes for shared settings between the Developer Platform and an app.
    com.aevi.printing
    This package provides classes for printing functionality in third-party applications.
    com.aevi.smartcard
    This package provides access to the smart card reader for non-payment cards.
    com.aevi.systembar
    This package contains a helper class enable and disable the buttons in the system bar.
    com.aevi.transactionlog
    This package provides classes that allow app developers to write log messages to the Aevi transaction log.
  • Classes in com.aevi.helpers.services used by com.aevi.configuration 
    Class and Description
    AeviService
    The base interface used for defining an AeviService
  • Classes in com.aevi.helpers.services used by com.aevi.crashlog 
    Class and Description
    AeviService
    The base interface used for defining an AeviService
    AeviServiceProvider
    Base class for service providers of AeviService.
  • Classes in com.aevi.helpers.services used by com.aevi.helpers 
    Class and Description
    AeviService
    The base interface used for defining an AeviService
    AeviServiceException
    Base class for exceptions that happen while trying to use a AeviService
    RemoteServiceError
    RemoteServiceError is used to be able to transfer exceptions via an AIDL interface.
  • Classes in com.aevi.helpers.services used by com.aevi.helpers.services 
    Class and Description
    AeviService
    The base interface used for defining an AeviService
    AeviServiceConnectionCallback
    Declaration for objects that want to receive SharedPreferencesServiceProvider connection notifications.
    AeviServiceException
    Base class for exceptions that happen while trying to use a AeviService
  • Classes in com.aevi.helpers.services used by com.aevi.led
